text: Union Sportive de Ben Guerdane () or USBG , is a Tunisian football club, based in the city of Ben Guerdane in southeast Tunisia. Founded in 17 July 1936, the team plays in yellow and black colors. Their ground is Stade du 7 Mars, which has a capacity of 10,000. He managed to reach for the first time in its history in Tunisian Professional League 1 during the season 2015. The club is chaired in 2016 by Mehdi Dbouba with which the team took a new dimension both on the national and continental level. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Tunisia Category:1930s establishments in Africa Category:1936 establishments Category:Football in Tunisia Category:African football clubs
title: US Ben Guerdane
